page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SCOTT
page.content: On saturday I usually get up about eight. I watch television then play with my friends on my B.M.X push bike. We ride down to a B.M.X track we do jumps. I go back home about two to go to the supermarket. We buy food, toys and drink. When we get back I have my dinner then play out with my football. at six o'clock I have my tea I usually have meat chips and vegetables. After tea I play on my B.M.X again we ride around the B.M.X track. I go home at half past nine I watch the television programmes then I go to my bedroom to play records. At about half past eleven I brush my teeth and get into bed. Then later I go to sleep.
